Ok, yahoo is making changes to groups.  I'm only listing those changes 
which will have an impact on our group.

. . .

Starting August 7, in order to access the files area of our group, you 
will have to be a web member of this group.  See 
http://help.yahoo.com/groups/groups-59.html for more information about 
this change.
